subsection_analysis.refined_text:
itchell JB (2014) Machine learning methods in chemoinformatics, Wiley 
Interdisciplinary Reviews: computational Molecular

u Z, Ramsundar B, Feinberg EN et al (2018) MoleculeNet: a benchmark 
for molecular machine learning

reported MoleculeNet, 
a large benchmark for molecular machine learning, and 
the evaluation results illustrated that graph-based meth-
ods  outperformed descriptor-based methods on most 
datasets [32]

In addition, little attention was paid to several newly 
state-of-the-art ML algorithms, such as XGBoost and 
LightGBM, which have illustrated great potentials for 
modelling various molecular properties [39–42]

Materials and methods
Datasets
To well compare the performance of descriptor-based 
and graph-based models, the dataset collection related 
to drug discovery used by Attentive FP was also adopted 
in this study [27]
